content: We're thrilled to offer you a glimpse at this year's roadmap, guiding us into a new chapter of Turtle WoW filled with the Mysteries of Azeroth. While it may not be a treasure map, it will certainly guide you to the secrets that yet await!
Hyjal's map is getting a major overhaul, allowing you to discover the mountain as you ascend, with a map that truly reflects the wonders and scars of this sacred peak! ‚õ∞Ô∏èüå≥
Dungeon maps will be updated to include the new sections and bosses added by the dungeon extensions in the next patch, starting with the Wailing Caverns! üó∫Ô∏èüß≠
This week's changelog is so short, even a murloc could memorize it! ü•Å
Delve into uncharted sections of well-known dungeons and discover new challenges that await in the next patch of Mysteries of Azeroth!
